= IRC Channel on freenode network =

Our official IRC channel, `#web-dot-php`, is located at [http://freenode.net/ freenode network]. We would love to hear your opinions about web.php. Do you have problems with web.php or are you having hard time understanding some parts of it? Our IRC channel is a place to get direct developer-to-developer information about everything on web.php.
